mapper.select: select p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, f.fno, f.fname, d.feed_no, m.mno, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname from har_post p inner join har_file f on p.pno=f.pno inner join har_feed d on p.pno=d.feed_no inner join har_tutor t on d.tno=t.tno inner join har_member m on t.tno=m.mno where p.pstat=1 order by d.feed_no

select p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, f.fno, f.fname, d.feed_no, m.mno, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname from har_post p inner join har_file f on p.pno=f.pno inner join har_feed d on p.pno=d.feed_no inner join har_tutor t on d.tno=t.tno inner join har_member m on t.tno=m.mno where d.feed_no = #{no} and p.pstat=1 order by d.feed_no
select count(*) from har_feed_like where feed_no=#{feedNo} and mno=#{memberNo}
